description:
The law firm of Philips Branch & Hodges in Columbus, Georgia, is dedicated to obtaining justice for those who suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to another party's negligence or wrongdoing. The attorneys at our law firm are licensed to practice in Georgia and Alabama, and we represent clients in both states who face legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • All types of personal injury and wrongful death claims resulting from car, truck and motorcycle accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, worksite injuries, medical malpractice, nursing home neglect, and more
  • Consumer protection against deceptive business practices and fraud
  • Bad faith insurance issues
  • False arrest and imprisonment and malicious prosecution

With decades of combined legal experience among them, our attorneys possess the skills and resources necessary to secure the maximum amount of compensation for those in need. Throughout our history, we have recovered more than $465 million in verdicts and settlements, earning our reputation as one of the top personal injury practices in the region. In fact, we receive a substantial amount of referrals from other attorneys and satisfied clients who know we can handle even the most complex and challenging cases.

If you were hurt or lost a loved one because of someone else's negligent, careless or reckless actions, you can trust Philips Branch & Hodges to aggressively advocate for your rights and entitlements. For a free case evaluation, you can contact our law firm to schedule a consultation with one of our attorneys.
